title: How to unsubscribe from Kyivstar TV
description: Unfortunately, I need more information to complete your request. The term "[REPORT_ERROR: kyyivstar-tb]" indicates that there was an error in retrieving the necessary information. To find the current monthly price in USD and cancellation steps for your specific Kyivstar TV plan, I need you to provide the exact name of your plan.

steps_1.title: Find Subscription Details and Cancellation Options
steps_1.description:
Here's how to find your Kyivstar TV plan details and cancellation options:

*   Provide the exact name of your Kyivstar TV plan.
*   I will then search for the current monthly price of the plan in USD.
*   I will also search for the steps to cancel the subscription.
*   Finally, I will look for a direct link to manage or cancel the subscription, if available.

seo_text: Learn how to cancel your Kyivstar TV subscription. Find the exact steps and manage your subscription effectively.
